response.summary: Interested in energy and Oil & Gas industry, process simulation, equipment sizing and design, conceptual design of process and optimization. Life cycle analysis and develop of new green technologies. Management of PFD, P&ID, Plot Plan, International Standards (API, ASME) and professional software of design and simulation of industrial plants (ASPEN HYSYS, AVEVA, COMSOL Multiphysics, etc ). Knowledge about process security, SG-SST, Inherently Safer Design, HAZOP, WHAT IF Analysis, Check list, Quantitative Risk Assessment (QRA), handling Guide Emergency Response (GRE). Control Project (PMBOK® Guide)
response.skills: Leadership, Strategic Planning, Sustainable development, Process Simulation, Life cycle assessment

profile_positions.description:
.Conceptual process design (Inherently Safer Design) 
.Process simulation (PRO II , ASPEN HYSYS and specialized software)
.Equipment sizing and design of KO drum, pipelines, pumps and flare stack system lines. 
.Management of PFD, P&ID, Plot Plan, International Standards (API, ASME).
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
-Project: Engineering design process, preliminary design and detailed design required to receive and to blend imported gas in the Ballenas station.
Main duties and responsibilities:
.Study and correlation of envelopes of dew point gases on Aspen HYSYS
.Engineering design of gas pipeline to gas dehydration system for blending and review of properties in order to RUT legislation on Aspen HYSYS.
.Hydrodynamic study of gas blend in pipeline and gas dehydration system in order to assure homogenous composition.

-Project: Engineering design process, preliminary design and detailed design of gas pipeline Jobo - Majaguas.
Main duties and responsibilities:
.Study of gas escape cases in pig launchers, dynamic calculation of fluid profiles of gas escape obtaining parameter for modeling consequences.
.Study of vent profile of pig launchers in normal operation.

-Project Management
Main duties and responsibilities:
. Interdisciplinary drawing up with project team of projects proposal to SMA 
. Evaluation and writing of work breakdown structure, project implementation plan,  periodic reports for monitoring and controlling projects in order to PMI structure.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer and Project Manager

school.name: Institut national des Sciences appliquées de Toulouse
